short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fixes some issues with Github Projects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension fixes the annoying "add column" link in the new Github Projects page.  

If you're like me, you don't need to add columns after you first set up the project, so the link gets annoying.  This extension just deletes it from the page, so you can't accidentally click it.

To add a new column, go to settings->extensions and disable the "Fix Github Projects" extension to re-enable the ability to add columns.
